abstract: House Foreign Affairs Committee Chairman Rep Ed Royce says families of Americans Saeed Abedini, Amir Hekmati and Jason Rezaian, who are imprisoned in Iran, and of missing American Robert A Levinson, will testify in committee hearing.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of three Americans imprisoned in Iran and of a fourth who has been missing there for eight years will be the featured witnesses on Tuesday at a House Foreign Affairs Committee hearing.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Prisoners’ Relatives to Testify

snippet: Relatives of three Americans imprisoned in Iran and of a fourth who has been missing there for eight years will be the featured witnesses on Tuesday at a House Foreign Affairs Committee hearing.
